did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Resolutions, handwritten by some citizens of Prescott, Arizona, and sent to General James H. Carlton of the military department of New Mexico and to other governmental officials, requesting that Allen L. Anderson and his regiment be returned to Fort Whipple, Arizona.

repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Prescott Citizens Committee resolutions(MS 279). Special Collections, University of Arizona.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Resolutions, handwritten by some citizens of Prescott, Arizona, and sent to General James H. Carlton of the military department of New Mexico and to other governmental officials, requesting that Allen L. Anderson and his regiment be returned to Fort Whipple, Arizona.
